short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will block profanity on a webpage, and the content surrounding it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Still in Beta so be careful!*
Works on many static websites (reddit is great) - but doesn't play nice with YouTube and Facebook comment plugins
Blok.it is a new way to interact with the web. Blok.it analyzes webpage elments when they load in order to detect any hurtful, hateful or otherwise negative content. This content is then rendered unreadable to the user. The original HTML and spacing is still maintained, so no funky formatting mishaps will happen. We hope that Blok.it will make surfing the web a safer and more enjoyable experience for everyone.
Check out the screenshots for examples. You can see a comment on a YouTube video before and after the extension is installed.
